ruleBookInfo.author: .r-fullstory-spec ul li:contains(Authors:) span a@text
ruleBookInfo.name: meta[property=og:title]@content

ruleContent.content: #article p@html||#arrticle p@html||.content-text p@html##Read .*?Online for Free|Translated by.*##

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>(function(){
    var idMatch = baseUrl.match(/chapters\/(\d+)/);
    if (!idMatch) return null;
    var id = idMatch[1];

    // Detect current page number (default = 1)
    var cur = baseUrl.match(/page\/(\d+)/);
    var curPage = cur ? parseInt(cur[1]) : 1;

    // Find all available /page/x/ links
    var regex = new RegExp('/chapters/' + id + '/page/(\\d+)/', 'g');
    var matches = [];
    var m;
    while ((m = regex.exec(src)) !== null) {
        var p = parseInt(m[1]);
        if (!isNaN(p) && !matches.includes(p)) matches.push(p);
    }

    if (matches.length === 0) return null;

    // Sort and get next greater page
    matches.sort(function(a,b){return a-b});
    for (var i=0; i<matches.length; i++) {
        if (matches[i] > curPage) {
            var nextUrl = 'https://ranobes.top/chapters/' + id + '/page/' + matches[i] + '/,{"webView":true}';
            java.put('nextTocUrl', nextUrl);
            return nextUrl;
        }
    }

    java.put('nextTocUrl', 'End of pagination at page ' + curPage);
    return null;
})()</js>
